title: Kidou Keisatsu Patlabor the Movie (Patlabor: The Movie)
synopsis: The Babylon Project is a massive renovation of Tokyo's neighborhoods, including the creation of artificial islands in the Bay. Utilizing "Labors," or robots created for the express purpose of doing work, architects and construction crews are able to more efficiently progress development of the overhaul. When a key figure in the Project's conception is found dead after committing suicide under mysterious circumstances, Captain Kiichi Gotou's Patlabor police unit is tasked with getting to the bottom of the bizarre situation.
related_anime: ['Kidou Keisatsu Patlabor: Reboot', 'Kidou Keisatsu Patlabor 2 the Movie', 'Kidou Keisatsu Patlabor']
